name: TsuukaAnimeInformation
0:
”Alexa, ask Tsuuka Anime when is the next episode of Boruto”
”Alexa, ask Tsuuka Anime about Madoka”
”Alexa, ask Tsuuka Anime about a random anime in the Action genre”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tsuuka anime
des: Ask Alexa and find out when the next episode of your favourite show airs, or discover a new show from a specific genre that you like.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
